page.title: 09HAPPY VALLEY & PETITION.
page.content: Happy Valley is an area of unspoilt natural beauty containing a large variety of wildlife, situated in the Bramhall area. There are plans by Stockport Council to surface pathways, erect picnic sites and the cutting down of trees to make the pathways. We, who are doing this petition, believe that these proposed plans would not only spoil the natural beauty, but drive out the wildlife of Happy Valley. This petition is an attempt to try to stop Stockport Council's plans for Happy Valley. Up to this present date we have spent about four hours doing this petition and have amassed a total of two hundred and twenty signatures. We have found that the local response has been overwhelming, only ten people have refused to sign.
